unitControlModule

Class UnitControlDisplay

  • java.lang.Object
    • unitControlModule.UnitControlDisplay

  • public class UnitControlDisplay
extends java.lang.Object
    UnitControlModuleDisplay.java --- Class for displaying all important information regarding Units, resources, queues etc.
    Author:
    P H - 14.04.2017

    • Method Detail

      • showConfidence

        public static void showConfidence(java.util.Collection<javaGOAP.GoapAgent> agents)
        Function for displaying the confidence of each Unit on the map at their current Position.
        Parameters:
        agents - the GoapAgents which contain the PlayerUnit references that are needed for displaying.

      • showQueueInformation

        public static void showQueueInformation(java.util.Collection<javaGOAP.GoapAgent> agents,
                                        java.util.Collection<PlayerBuilding> buildings,
                                        InformationStorage informationStorage)
        Main function for showing all important queued information regarding all PlayerBuildings and PlayerUnitWorkers. This includes queued buildings, technologies etc. as well as reserved resources and construction timers / bars.
        Parameters:
        agents - the GoapAgents which contain the PlayerUnit instances that are going to be used to show information.
        buildings - the PlayerUnitBuilding instances that are going to be used to show information like training Units, added Addons, etc.
        informationStorage - object that holds all important worker and resource information.

      • leaveOneLineFree

        private static int leaveOneLineFree(int posY)
        Function for adding the default line height to the given y position and returning it.
        Parameters:
        posY - the Integer that the default line height is going to be added to.
        Returns:
        the sum of the default line height and the given Integer.

      • showResourceInformation

        public static int showResourceInformation(int posX,
                                          int posY,
                                          InformationStorage informationStorage)
        Function for showing the reserved resources of the ResourceReserver on the screen.
        Parameters:
        posX - the x position of the information being displayed.
        posY - the y position of the information being displayed.
        informationStorage - object that holds all important worker and resource information.
        Returns:
        the new y position the next line of text starts without interfering with the currently display ones.

      • showWorkerInformation

        public static int showWorkerInformation(int posX,
                                        int posY,
                                        java.util.Collection<javaGOAP.GoapAgent> agents)
        Function for displaying all important PlayerUnitWorker information on the screen.
        Parameters:
        posX - the x position of the information being displayed.
        posY - the y position of the information being displayed.
        agents - the agents the PlayerUnitWorkers are extracted from.
        Returns:
        the new y position the next line of text starts without interfering with the currently display ones.

      • getPerformingConstrcutionWorkers

        private static java.util.List<PlayerUnitWorker> getPerformingConstrcutionWorkers(java.util.Collection<javaGOAP.GoapAgent> agents)
        Function for extracting all PlayerUnitWorkers from a Collection of GoapAgents that are assigned a construction job and as well as already started the construction of the building.
        Parameters:
        agents - the Collection of GoapAgents from which all PlayerUnitWorkers are extracted from.
        Returns:
        a List of all PlayerUnitWorkers that are assigned a construction job and started the construction of the building.

      • sortConstructionWorkers

        private static java.util.List<PlayerUnitWorker> sortConstructionWorkers(java.util.List<PlayerUnitWorker> workers)
        Function for sorting a List of PlayerUnitWorkers according to the time that their assigned construction job requires. The ones with the percentual least time left are moved to the beginning of the List.
        Parameters:
        workers - the List of PlayerUnitWorkers that is going to be sorted.
        Returns:
        a sorted List of PlayerUnitWorkers with the workers that are assigned the construction job requiring the least percentual additional time in the beginning.

      • showBuildingInformation

        public static int showBuildingInformation(int posX,
                                          int posY,
                                          java.util.Collection<PlayerBuilding> buildings)
        Function for displaying all important PlayerUnitBuilding information on the screen.
        Parameters:
        posX - the x position of the information being displayed.
        posY - the y position of the information being displayed.
        buildings - the buildings the information are extracted from.
        Returns:
        the new y position the next line of text starts without interfering with the currently display ones.

      • sortBuildings

        private static java.util.List<PlayerBuilding> sortBuildings(java.util.Collection<PlayerBuilding> buildings)
        Function for sorting a Collection of PlayerBuildings according to the time that their specific production / research etc. requires. The ones with the percentual least time left are moved to the beginning of the List.
        Parameters:
        buildings - the Collection of PlayerBuildings that is going to be sorted.
        Returns:
        a sorted List of PlayerBuildings with the buildings requiring the least percentual additional time in the beginning.

      • showBuildingQueue

        public static int showBuildingQueue(int posX,
                                    int posY,
                                    java.util.Collection<javaGOAP.GoapAgent> agents)
        Function for displaying the building Queue on the screen.
        Parameters:
        posX - the x position of the information being displayed.
        posY - the y position of the information being displayed. * @param agents the agents the PlayerUnitWorkers are extracted from which are used for accessing the construction manager instance.
        Returns:
        the new y position the next line of text starts without interfering with the currently display ones.

        collection - the collection that is going to be displayed on the screen.

      • showBarFilled

        public static void showBarFilled(int posX,
                                 int posY,
                                 int width,
                                 int height,
                                 int currentValue,
                                 int maxValue,
                                 bwapi.Color color)
        Function for displaying a bar on the screen which is filled to a certain extent.
        Parameters:
        posX - the x position of the bar being displayed.
        posY - the y position of the bar being displayed.
        width - the width of the bar.
        height - the height of the bar.
        currentValue - the current value that is represented in relation to the maximum value with the bar.
        maxValue - the maximum that is going to be displayed in relation to the minimum value with the bar.
        color - the Color that the bar will be displayed in.
